Package com.rb.nonbiz.collections

Class BitSet2D

java.lang.Object
com.rb.nonbiz.collections.BitSet2D
public class BitSet2D
extends java.lang.Object
This is effectively a space-optimized 2-dimensional boolean array.

Internally, and although this is not exposed, we are using a 1-d plain BitSet, but this class has constant-time access for any row/column combination.

This is a rare instance of a mutable class.
